name: Flipacoin

skdetail:

des:
Next time you're trying to make a difficult decision, just ask Alexa for help. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
